  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:laneSet id="node_3">
      <bpmn:lane id="node_4" name="Students">

        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_8</bpmn:flowNodeRef>

      <bpmn:lane id="node_5" name="Psychology">

        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_15</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>

        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_16</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
    </bpmn:laneSet>
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_2" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="user" pm:assignedUsers="1" pm:assignedGroups="" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":1225,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":1224,"completed_url":null,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null},"webentryRouteConfig":{"nodeId":"node_2","nodeType":null,"processId":626,"parameters":[],"firstUrlSegment":null,"urlType":"standard-url","entryUrl":"https:\/\/qualitlabs-qa.processmaker.net\/webentry\/626\/node_2"}}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_8" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_12</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_8"/>
    <bpmn:callActivity id="node_13" name="SubPsychology" pm:config="{"calledElement":"ProcessId-635","processId":635,"startEvent":"node_1","name":"Sub Process Psychology"}" pm:assignment="user_group" pm:assignedUsers="" pm:assignedGroups="">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_17</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:callActivity>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="careers == "Psychology"" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_13">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">careers == "Psychology"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:callActivity id="node_14" name="SubLanguages" pm:config="{"calledElement":"ProcessId-636","processId":636,"startEvent":"node_1","name":"Sub Process Languages"}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_12</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_18</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:callActivity>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_12" name="careers == "Languages"" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_14">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">careers == "Languages"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_15" name="End Event" pm:screenRef="1226">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_17</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_16" name="End Event" pm:screenRef="1223">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_18</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_17" name="" sourceRef="node_13" targetRef="node_15"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_18" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_16"/>
  </bpmn:process>
